page.title: 14Shops in Blandford
page.content: We have listed 228 businesses in the town.Some have been here for more than 200 years,11 since before 1900.40 new businesses opened in the 1970's & 82 new businesses in the 1980's, 13 of them this year.The Shop of the Year in 1984 is Safeways Supermarket. 130 peo- ple work there,100 of them live in Blandford.Safeways brought a new lease of life to the Ham,West St & Greyhound Courtyard.The Floor Manager told us "it is thriving;14000 people a week go there spending on average Â£8 - Â£9." The Open Market on Thursday & Saturday attracts people from the villages around and maintains an old custom and tradition. New 1985 shops include:All Togs;Precious Moments;J.D.Barnes,DIY; Beauty Salon;Blue Star Video; Inspection Copy Services; Garrets Antiques;Isis;Rivoli;Blandford Delicatessen & the Furniture Bazaar.
